title: Remove your feedback
description: Removes feedback the authenticated user has posted against a listing.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

path.name: feedbackId
path.description: The ID of the feedback to remove.

returns.description: <FeedbackResponse> Details on whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: StatusCode
fields.description: The status code indicating what went wrong if the operation failed.

enum.name: MemberNotFound
enum.description: The member could not be found.

enum.name: IncorrectMember
enum.description: The feedback is not for this member.

enum.name: NotWinner
enum.description: The member did not win the auction.

enum.name: NotWinnerOffer
enum.description: The member did not win the offer.

enum.name: NotSupported
enum.description: The feedback type is not supported.

enum.name: NoFixedPriceOffer
enum.description: There is not a fixed price offer.

enum.name: InvalidFeedback
enum.description: The feedback text submitted is not valid.

fields.name: FeedbackId
fields.description: If the operation succeeded, the ID of the new feedback.
